stories.text:
NFTs are, depending on if you are talking to a zealot or a skeptic, either the second coming of TechnoChrist or the biggest scam to be invented in Crypto since the scam of Crypto was invented.[0] What do you think?

[0] https://every.to/napkin-math/nft-projects-are-just-mlms-for-tech-elites
stories.title: Ask HN: Are NFTs a Circlejerk of the Rich?

stories.text:
Hey HN community - I'm a YC Alum who decided to forego YC this time around when we started a new company (we still love the YC community - not a reflection on YC).

We're here because we are hiring to achieve our vision - a bug-free world for software developers. We are bringing on a few Fortune 500 companies soon, and are hiring aggressively for the talent - and with that, we have various roles open within our company: * Full-Stack SW Developer * Front-End SW Developer * Back-End SW Developer * Special Projects to the CEO

We would love for you to check us out (https://www.plumbr.ai) and apply (https://careers.plumbr.ai/careers). We have an incredibly exciting team that has built state-of-the-art AI, CI/CD, and UI systems at Tesla, MLB, Airbnb, and Facebook.
stories.title: Job Openings with Heavily-Funded, Early Startup (YC Alum)
